reviewText: and perhaps good material for newbies ,but the video presentation is extremely boring and amateurish. Even the background which matched the presenters shirt, desk, etc was DRAB.  To hold my attention it need a bit more zip.

Mario does it again! In his new DVD series, these full length videos allow him to be more detailed than his excellent Youtube videos featured on Sellinginsite.com. This video is honest, straightforward, and comprehensive. Mario covers everything you need to consider before entering a real estate career, including what it's like in this business, and how to choose your market, office, and area of focus. Should you work in a team? As an individual? Part time or full time? What kinds of expenses will you have, and how are you going to get clients? Mario covers it all, and doesn't sugar-coat it. If you're looking into a real estate career, do yourself a favor and pick up this video - you won't be disappointed!
